name: Double Dodge!
description:
Put your multi-tasking skills to the test and keep both players alive! Dodge anything that comes your way! Your players are not able to cross the middle line but the enemies can and will use it to their advantage to reign terror on either side. Too hard solo? Grab a partner and make it a team effort!  

Instructions

  1. Press "Play" to start the game.
  2. Use "A/W/S/D" to move the player on the left and the arrow keys to move the right player. Dodge any enemies and walls that come your way. 
  3. Your score is proudly displayed on the top left -- The higher the better!

Repo url: https://github.com/skhamis/bevy-gamejam-double-dodge
